# Linter Error Scenarios

Minimal scenarios for each validation rule.

- `chyba-01-duplicate-control-ident.xml` -> `duplicate-control-ident`
- `chyba-02-duplicate-button-ident.xml` -> `duplicate-button-ident`
- `chyba-03-duplicate-section-ident.xml` -> `duplicate-section-ident`
- `chyba-04-unknown-form-ident.xml` -> `unknown-form-ident`
- `chyba-05-unknown-form-control-ident.xml` -> `unknown-form-control-ident`
- `chyba-06-unknown-form-button-ident.xml` -> `unknown-form-button-ident`
- `chyba-07-unknown-workflow-button-share-code-ident.xml` -> `unknown-workflow-button-share-code-ident`
- `chyba-08-unknown-form-section-ident.xml` -> `unknown-form-section-ident`
- `chyba-09-unknown-mapping-ident.xml` -> `unknown-mapping-ident`
- `chyba-10-unknown-mapping-form-ident.xml` -> `unknown-mapping-form-ident`
- `chyba-11-unknown-using-component.xml` -> `unknown-using-component`
- `chyba-12-unknown-using-section.xml` -> `unknown-using-section`
- `chyba-13-unknown-required-action-ident.xml` -> `unknown-required-action-ident`
- `chyba-14-unknown-workflow-action-value-control-ident.xml` -> `unknown-workflow-action-value-control-ident`
- `chyba-15-unknown-workflow-show-hide-control-ident.xml` -> `unknown-workflow-show-hide-control-ident`
- `chyba-16-ident-convention-workflow-postfix.xml` -> `ident-convention-workflow-postfix`
- `chyba-17-ident-convention-view-postfix.xml` -> `ident-convention-view-postfix`
- `chyba-18-ident-convention-group-button-postfix.xml` -> `ident-convention-group-button-postfix`
- `chyba-19-ident-convention-button-postfix.xml` -> `ident-convention-button-postfix`
- `chyba-20-ident-convention-lookup-control.xml` -> `ident-convention-lookup-control`
- `chyba-21-unknown-html-template-control-ident.xml` -> `unknown-html-template-control-ident`
- `chyba-22-sql-convention-equals-spacing.xml` -> `sql-convention-equals-spacing`
- `chyba-23-typo-maxlenght-attribute.xml` -> `typo-maxlenght-attribute`
- `chyba-24-ident-convention-lookup-missing-plural.xml` -> `ident-convention-lookup-control` (missing plural `s` on multi-select lookup)
